name: Safe Place
description:
This game was made for the GMTK 2019 Game Jam in less than 48 hours by a single person. All code, "art" and music was made specifically for the jam.

You may only attack once per screen.

Controls:

Movement - Arrows

Attack - X

Jump - C

Full screen - F4

Note that sometimes you need to press C for only a really short time to make it!

Oh and by the way the stuff that happens if you keep going after the last room is absolutely most certainly intended and only there to add replayability!!1!
